name: Nilickr
short_description:
Nilickr allows you to share any file with any format anywhere in this world...
Nilickr guarantees you to be the world fastest and most convenient messaging service..
Nilickr uses the servers of Telegram and itself sync all the users of Telegram!
Just like Telegram-Nilickr is a Non-Profit Application!
Just like Email service Nilickr allows everyone to share file with any format...
In speed and reliability it is much better than Whatsapp!
MADE IN BHARAT
summary: Now Share Any File With Any One !
